item.title: i drove my bike all around.
item.description: last night I got home from work. went to the mega mall and got my yoyo case. it rules. so insane. haha. I will take a picture. matiss got a cell phone. haha. ;) i rode my bike a bunch yesterday. apparently around 15 miles. I haven’t rode a bike in years. it was interesting to find myself getting back in to the hang of it. I can now ride for a long time with no hands.
